name: Z image generator kie AI
description:
Generates an image from a text prompt using the Z-Image model from Tongyi-MAI, through the kie.ai API.
Pricing (as of December 2025): ~$0.004 per image.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: equired API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created image (without extension), defaults to None (uses task_id)

aspect_ratio.description: Optional aspect ration of the generated image, must be one of '1:1', '4:3', '3:4', '16:9', '9:16'. Defaults to '4:3'

saved_local_image_path.description: The local path where the image is saved

temporary_image_url.description: The URL of the temporary image
